character.age: 250 years, appears to be in her mid-20s due to elven aging process
character.background: Born in the realm of Elvanar, Eira was chosen by the ancient magic that dwells within the land. She has been trained as a wielder of this magic, but feels an inexplicable pull towards the outside world.
character.place_of_birth: Elvanar, a mystical realm hidden beyond human understanding

physical_appearance.hair_color: Dark brown, falls down her back like a waterfall of night
